texts: I want help with IBM Cloud status.
How can I get the status of Bluemix

parameters.name: region
parameters.title: region name
parameters.prompt: OK. What region do you want status for *US South*, *United Kingdom*, or *Sydney*?

classes.description: Monitor the status of a Bluemix service
texts: I want to monitor the status of the service
Notify me when the service health changes
Alert me when a service goes down
Tell me when a service comes back up
